definition: generic term for cotton or kapok/cotton/padded or quilted with cotton
flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful

sentences.english: For years, the government has been buoying up cotton prices.
sentences.chinese: 多年來政府一直保持棉花高價格。

sentences.english: Yongxian: Kapok is the city flower of Guangzhou.
Old black Joe still pickin ' cotton.
sentences.chinese: 老黑人喬仍然在摘棉花。

sentences.english: Filtrates produced from antagonistic bacteria were also inhibitory to growth of V. dahliae.
sentences.chinese: 這些拮抗菌的培養濾液也能抑制棉花黃萎菌的生長。

sentences.english: Many of the Parsee merchants have made great fortunes there by dealing in cotton;
sentences.chinese: 很多帕西商人在印度作棉花生意發了大財。

sentences.english: He decided to grow cotton in his field next year.
sentences.chinese: 他打算明年在自己的地畝上種棉花。

sentences.english: Rice, cotton and vegetable seeds are sometimes grown in special seedbeds.
sentences.chinese: 有時，大米，棉花和蔬菜種子要在苗牀培育。

sentences.english: I do not deny that your No. 33 bleached cotton is top quality.
sentences.chinese: 意思爲我不否認你的33號漂白棉花質量是頂級的。
脫葉磷是一種棉花脫葉劑。

sentences.english: The cotton grows well with high yield mainly by first and second irrigation.
sentences.chinese: 棉花生長期長勢良好，產量主要靠一水和二水來完成。

sentences.english: Pleas open your hand. Press it with this bit of cotton wool for a while.
sentences.chinese: 請張開手，用這塊棉花壓一會兒。

sentences.english: The distribution position of cotton root system in the tilth is closely related with cotton yield.
sentences.chinese: 棉花根系在耕層分佈的位置與產量密切相關。

sentences.english: Kapok, as usual, I go there to see a few, but you can see it.
sentences.chinese: 我像往常一樣往木棉花數那兒看，卻再也看不到了。

sentences.english: Most have paid if the smuggling of cotton, but also Faqian.
sentences.chinese: 大多數都要上交，如果走私棉花，還要罰錢。

definition: generic term for cotton or kapok/cotton/padded or quilted with cotton
jute (Corchorus capsularis Linn.)/plant fiber used for rope or sacks
